Text: Wow 2 episodes in one day..The more i see days the more i like it,my favorite soap.I can imagine how awesome it could be if the episodes had subtitles of my couyntry and stuff..That it will be great just great 100% joy..But what can u do u can have it all and i am thankfull for all the soap i have with days and my other friend MsFenmore with Bold.Btw my English are not perfect but at least i am amble to understand almost everything of that is happening.!Jmanwf my friend is there a way with a program or something to put subtitles on the show.???
